Posts.Content:
A friend`s mother has been diagnosed with breast cancer and has been referred to Dr. Robert S. Davidson of Surgical Associates of West Florida.
Joe2011
AGE at time of diagnosis 63
PSA 3.9 (last year 3.5)
Biopsy: 
2 of twelve cores
Left mid Gleason 4+3=7 10% of core
Right Lateral Mid Gleason 3+3=6 5% of core
No Perineural Invasion Identified
T1c
Posts.Title: Surgeon in West Florida :Dr. Robert S. Davidson
